title: Best of the Program | Guest: Sharyl Attkisson | 11/21/19
description:
Glenn can’t look at Adam Schiff any more! The Left insists everything Trump says is a conspiracy theory, despite any FACTS! Today’s inquisition features David Holmes, who overheard a call, and Fiona Hill, who will focus on Russia. But yesterday Glenn spoke to the president’s personal attorney, Rudy Giuliani, and he explained EXACTLY what he was doing in Ukraine (being a defense attorney)! Journalist and host of “Full Measure” Sharyl Attkisson describes the hearings as a last gasp of the State Department bureaucrats who insist they run the show.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
